description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Appointment	: Senior Sales Engineer
              
              Market Segment	: Power Utilities (Electrical)
              
              Reports to	: Sales Manager
              
              Core Products:  Utility terminations & splices/joints, tapes, electrical supplies, cool/heat shrink products, resins, etc.
              
              Link to the typical products:
              
              http://solutions.3m.com/wps/portal/3M/en_US/ElectricalUtility/Home/
              

              http://solutions.3m.com/wps/portal/3M/en_US/EMDCI/Home/
              


              1.	Work Location:
              
              3M Head Office, 20F Mapletree Business Center, 1060 Nguyen Van Linh Blvd., Tan Phong Ward, District 7, HCMC
              

              2.    Major Responsibility
              
              Achieve sales objectives by providing independent sales coverage of assigned market segments with minimal supervision.
              

              3.	Job Expectations
              
              - Be accountable for promotion and sale of a broad range of products/solutions in the Power Utilities / Electrical market segment under the direction of Sales Manager.
              
              - Forecast sales to identify trends to capitalize on proactive selling solutions.
              
              - Develop new sales opportunities, pursue sales leads and addresses the needs of larger accounts.
              
              - Calling on customer within assigned area or accounts.
              
              - Utilize excellent products/solutions and customer knowledge to act as a consultant for high-level customer contacts regarding customer's present and future needs.
              
              - Encourages partnering as a mean toward account penetration and increased profitability.
              
              - Be accountable for sales forecast accuracy & weekly activities
              
              - Be pro-active to work closely with Utility (EVN and its subsidiaries) & Industry End Users to get/update their needs.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - Minimum 5 year project sales experience in electrical market
              
              - Bachelor's degree in Electrical engineering
              
              - Well understand the EVN tender process
              
              - Be able to identify, qualify and prioritize new opportunities.
              
              - Be able to assess a situation and quickly formulate the correct solution
              
              - Robust interpersonal skills with customers and partners
              
              - Strong attention to details, excellent follow through and organizational skills.
              
              - Willing to work flexible hours
              
              - Ability to work in team
              
              - Ability to communicate in English
